controller

Class BookingController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.DatabaseController
      • controller.BookingController

  • public class BookingController
extends DatabaseController
    A controller to perform storing and retrieval of Booking to/from database. Also validates changes before committing any changes to database.
    Since:
    2017-11-06
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Royston

    • Constructor Detail

      • BookingController

        private BookingController()

    • Method Detail

      • addBooking

        public void addBooking(java.lang.String userName,
                       java.lang.String mobileNum,
                       java.lang.String emailAddress,
                       int cinemaID,
                       int movieScreeningID,
                       double price)
        Add Booking into the BookingList after the MovieGoer has confirmed the booking. It captures the name, mobile number, email address, cinema ID and movie screening ID of the MovieGoer. It will also updates the sales for the movie booked by the MovieGoer.
        Parameters:
        userName - Name of the MovieGoer
        mobileNum - Mobile number of the MovieGoer
        emailAddress - Email address of the MovieGoer
        cinemaID - Cinema ID of the movie screening booked by the MovieGoer
        movieScreeningID - Movie Screening ID of the movie screening booked by the MovieGoer
        price - Total amount paid by the MovieGoer

      • calculatePrice

        public double calculatePrice(int type,
                             int movieScreeningID)
        Computes the cost of the booking made by the MovieGoer inclusive of 7% GST.
        Parameters:
        type - Integer value 1 for Children Discount, 2 for Senior Discount. Adult otherwise.
        movieScreeningID - Movie Screening ID of the booking made by the MovieGoer.
        Returns:
        Total cost of the booking inclusive of GST.

      • getAllBookingByUser

        public java.util.ArrayList<Booking> getAllBookingByUser(java.lang.String emailAddress)
        Gets all the bookings made by the MovieGoer.
        Parameters:
        emailAddress - Email address of the MovieGoer.
        Returns:
        List of bookings made by the MovieGoer.

      • getBookingList

        public java.util.ArrayList<Booking> getBookingList()
        Get the all of the bookings.
        Returns:
        List of bookings.

      • getInstance

        public static BookingController getInstance()
        Gets the channel reference of the BookingController. Creates the channel reference if it do not exists.
        Returns:
        Instance of the Booking Controller.

      • readDB

        protected void readDB()
        Retrieve the Bookings from database. The order is as follows: String transactionId , int movieScreeningID, String userName, String mobileNum, String emailAddress These variables are parsed into the Booking objects and stored when the Booking Controller is initalized.
        Specified by:
        readDB in class DatabaseController

      • updateSales

        private void updateSales(int movieID,
                         double price)
        Update the total sales of the Movie by using the MovieID.
        Parameters:
        movieID - Movie ID of the movie booked by the MovieGoer.
        price - Sales of the movie.

      • writeDB

        protected void writeDB()
        Save the Booking model into database. Each line in the Bookings.dat file is a booking object. The order is as follows: String transactionId , int movieScreeningID, String userName, String mobileNum, String emailAddress, int cinemaID These will be appended into the Bookings.dat file in sequence.
        Specified by:
        writeDB in class DatabaseController
